name: Ready for Anything
text:
Play only as your first action.
Draw 1 card (2 cards instead if you drew an enemy this round). Then, heal 1 horror. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Hunter's Mark
text:
Fast. Attach to an enemy at your location. Limit 1 per enemy.
Investigators get +1 [combat] while fighting this enemy.
[reaction] When damage is dealt to attached enemy, discard Hunter's Mark: Deal 1 additional damage to that enemy. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

name: Correlate All Its Contents
text: Investigate. You may cancel the first chaos token revealed for this skill test, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new one. If you succeed at this skill test, place 1 charge or secret on an asset controlled by an investigator at your location (if you succeed by exactly 1 or 3, place 2 charges or secrets on that asset instead).

name: Luger P08
text: Uses (2 ammo). [free] Exhaust Luger P08 and spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. [action] Spend 1 resource: Replenish all ammo on Lugar P08 and ready it.

name: Mob Connections
text:
Exceptional.
[action] Spend 1 resources: Draw the card attached to Mob Connections.
[reaction] When an [[Illicit]] asset you control is discarded from play, exhaust Mob Connections: Attach that asset to this card, facedown. Limit 1 attached asset.

name: Gatling Gun
text: Uses (12 ammo). [action] Spend 1-6 ammo: Fight. You get +X [combat] for this attack. The difficulty for this attack is equal to the combined fight values of all enemies at your location. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals X damage divided as you choose among enemies at your location. X is the amount of ammo spent as part of this ability's cost.

name: Whispers of Doom
text: Parley. Choose a non-weakness enemy at your location and test [willpower] (3), This test gets +X difficulty, where X is that enemy's horror value. If you succeed, defeat that enemy (or deal it 3 damage instead if it is [[Elite]]). If you fail, place 1 doom on that enemy.

name: Deliverance
text:
Fast. Play when the "draw encounter cards" step of the mythos phase would begin.
You draw each encounter card that would normally be drawn this mythos phase. Cards drawn during this mythos phase cannot be cancelled, and the first card drawn gains surge.
Skip the "draw encounter cards" step of the next mythos phase. Max twice per game.

name: Lawrence Carlisle
text: You get +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After you discard 1 or more cards from your hand during your turn, exhaust Lawrence Carlisle: Gain 1 resource.
flavor: "Each block of clay hides all manner of fantastical things."

name: Good Weather
text: Myriad. Fast. Play after the investigation phase begins. Group limit 1 in play. Put Good Weather into play next to the agenda deck and choose a skill. While this card is in play, each investigator gets +2 to the chosen skill. Forced — When the investigation phase begins: Discard Good Weather.

name: Improvised Weapon
text: You may play Improvised Weapon from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects and draw 1 card. Fight. The attacked enemy gets -2 fight for this attack. (If you played Improvised Weapon from your discard pile, this attack deals +1 damage.)

name: Library Pass
text: [[Miskatonic]], [[Scholar]] deck only. Limit 1 per deck. [free] During your turn, if there is no asset attached to Library Pass, spend 1 resource: Attach a [[Tome]] asset from your hand to this card. Attached asset takes up no slots. Limit 1 attached asset. Revelation — When your turn ends: Place attached asset on the bottom of your deck.

name: Forbidden Sutra
text:
[[Blessed]], [[Cursed]], [[Sorcerer]] deck only. You get +1 skill value while resolving [[Spell]] events.
[reaction] During a skill test on a [[Spell]] event, take up to 3 horror: For each horror taken, reveal an additional chaos token for this test. Choose 1 of the revealed tokens to resolve and ignore the rest.

name: True Awakening
text:
[[Blessed]], [[Chosen]], [[Drifter]] deck only.
Choose and resolve two of the following, in any order:
- Draw 2 cards.
- Discover 1 clue at your location.
- Heal 1 damage.
- Heal 1 horror.

name: Nose to the Grindstone
text:
[[Criminal]], [[Drifter]], [[Entrepreneur]] deck only.
[free] During a skill test on a [[Tool]] asset, exhaust Nose to the Grindstone: You get +2 skill value for this skill test. If this skill test fails, either replenish 1 supply on that asset or gain 1 resource.

name: Sound Support
text:
[[Assistant]], [[Medic]], [[Warden]] deck only.
Limit 1 per investigator.
Sound Support may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When your turn begins: Heal 1 damage or 1 horror from Sound Support.

name: Archibald MacVeigh
text:
[[Assistant]], [[Reporter]], [[Scholar]] deck only. Uses (4 secrets).
You get +1 [intellect].
Secrets on assets you control may be spent as resources to pay for [[Insight]] events you play.
flavor: "Publish or Perish, they said. Perhaps we'll do both."
